civicLiteracy.description: Civic Literacy Requirement - State-mandated requirement met via specific courses and exam
civicLiteracy.notes: Students must complete one of these courses plus an exam

international.description: International Requirement - 3 credits of international coursework
international.notes: Search for courses with 'international' in description or course codes starting with INT_, ISS_, LAT_, AFH_, ASH_, EUH_, etc.

diversity.description: Diversity Requirement - 3 credits of diversity coursework (cultural, race, gender, sexuality perspectives)
diversity.notes: Cross-listed courses often satisfy both International and Diversity

writing.description: Writing Requirement - 24,000 words total across courses
writing.notes: Courses have writingWords field: 2, 4, or 6. Students need combinations totaling 24,000 words (e.g., 6+6+6+6 = 24k)

summerEnrollment.description: Summer Enrollment - Students with <60 credits at entry must complete 9+ credits in summer
summerEnrollment.notes: Check course availability during summer term

questRequirements.description: UF Quest 1 & 2 - Two interdisciplinary courses exploring 'Big Questions'

quest2.description: Social/Natural Sciences inquiry (e.g., social science, natural science, math)

questRequirements.notes: Courses tagged with quest designation in catalog
